Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) are devices that enable economically viable production of clean fuel such as hydrogen gas, which can be used in many industrial applications and serving as an energy carrier for renewable energy sources.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: Operation of SOEC at intermediate temperature (IT) range (400 to 600 degrees C) is highly attractive because many unexploited heat sources from industries can be utilized.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: Proton conducting SOECs based on barium-zirconium-cerate electrolytes show great potential for operating at this temperature range due to their high proton conductivity at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: In this study, a new tridoped BaCe0.5Zr0.2Y0.1Yb0.1Gd0.1O3-delta (BCZYYbGd) electrolyte with very high chemical stability and proton conductivity is coupled with a PrNi0.5Co0.5O3-delta steam electrode and a Ni-BCYYbGd hydrogen electrode for IT-SOEC operation.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: The dopants of the electrolyte were carefully designed to obtain the optimum stability and conductivity for IT-SOEC.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: The BCYYbGd electrolyte was stable over 200 h at 50 vol % steam in argon and at 600 degrees C, and a very high electrolysis current density of 2.405 A cm(-2) was obtained at 600 degrees C and 1.6 Vat 20 vol % of steam in argon.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)

Sentencas: This system was also found to be highly reversible, exhibiting very high performance in SOFC mode and suggesting a potential candidate for next generation proton conducting electrolyte.
Titulo: Tri-Doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 as a Chemically Stable Electrolyte with High Proton-Conductivity for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOECs)
